title: AgriFusion 2025 Highlights Multidisciplinary Innovations for a Sustainable Agricultural Future | Namal University
text: Home Event AgriFusion 2025 Highlights Multidisciplinary Innovations for a Sustainable Agricultural Future Event Latest From Namal AgriFusion 2025 Highlights Multidisciplinary Innovations for a Sustainable Agricultural Future AgriFusion 2025: Multidisciplinary Technologies and Innovations for Sustainable Agriculture — a National Symposium on Agricultural Innovation organized by the Office of Research, Innovation, and Commercialization (ORIC) at Namal University, Mianwali, held on Saturday, 31st May 2025. AgriFusion 2025 brought together renowned keynote speakers from academia and industry for a dynamic exchange of ideas and to foster collaboration between academia and the agri-industry. The event featured student-led agricultural projects, a faculty idea pitch competition on research and innovation in agriculture and allied fields, panel discussions addressing local challenges and global agricultural perspectives, and industry stalls showcasing cutting-edge agri-technologies. title: Cultural Fest 2025 | Namal University
text: Home Event Cultural Fest 2025 Event Latest From Namal Cultural Fest 2025 A vibrant celebration of Pakistan’s cultural heritage! From traditional cuisines to soulful performances, Cultural Fest 2025 brought colors, music, and joy to Namal University, Mianwali. Organized by the Namal Society for Social Impact (NSSI), the event was officially inaugurated by our esteemed BOG members with a ribbon-cutting ceremony. A heartfelt tribute to unity, tradition, and the spirit of being. title: Farewell Party of the Class 2025 | Namal University
text: Home Event Farewell Party of the Class 2025 Event Latest From Namal Farewell Party of the Class 2025 It's always one of the most touching moments for the faculty, management and the junior students to bid farewell to Namal's very own would-be graduates. The class of 2026, as per our tradition, arranged an extraordinary farewell party/dinner for the outgoing class of 2025. The students of third year and the final year students showed an awesome bondage. The management won appreciation for arranging the exceptional and befitting farewell for the class 2025. Excitement was its peak, but each one became emotional because of the inevitability of departure. God bless you, Class 2025! title: Girl Boss of the Year 2025 – Celebrating Namal's Empowered Women Entrepreneurs | Namal University
text: Home Event Girl Boss of the Year 2025 – Celebrating Namal's Empowered Women Entrepreneurs Event Latest From Namal Girl Boss of the Year 2025 – Celebrating Namal's Empowered Women Entrepreneurs Empowered women, empowering futures! Namal Idea Club (NIC) organized the Girl Boss of the Year event. From sizzling snacks to stunning arts, from handcrafted jewels to heartfelt hustle Girl Boss of the Year was a celebration of creativity, courage, and unapologetic ambition! Namal's talented girls turned ideas into impact, proving once again that when women lead, magic happens. Shoutout to all the boss ladies who showed the world what leadership really looks like! title: Mathematics Carnival 2025 | Namal University
text: Home Event Mathematics Carnival 2025 Event Latest From Namal Mathematics Carnival 2025 The Department of Mathematics, proudly organized Mathematics Carnival 2025, bringing together 300+ students from 16 schools across Mianwali, Lawa, Namal, and Musa Khel. The event featured exciting Quiz, Skit, and Stall Competitions, celebrating creativity, teamwork, and a love for math. A big thank you to all participants for making it a memorable success. title: Namal Alumni Association Executive Committee Takes Oath | Namal University
text: Home Event Namal Alumni Association Executive Committee Takes Oath Event Latest From Namal Namal Alumni Association Executive Committee Takes Oath As we embark on this new journey together, the Namal Alumni Association Executive Committee officially took oath of office, marking the start of a united and empowered alumni future. With this step, Namalites now have a representative alumni body focused on building connections, supporting opportunities, and encouraging continued engagement within the community. title: Namal Open House & Career Fair 2025 | Namal University
text: Home Event Namal Open House & Career Fair 2025 Event Latest From Namal Namal Open House & Career Fair 2025 A Day of Discovery, Dialogue, and Opportunity! On May 24, 2025, Namal University proudly hosted its 11th Open House and 2nd Career Fair, a dynamic convergence of talent, innovation, and industry. From the passion and creativity of our final-year students showcasing their Final Year Projects (FYPs) to the meaningful networking between students and top-tier recruiters, the event was a resounding success. It was truly inspiring to witness the collaboration between academia and industry as we work together to shape a brighter future for the next generation of professionals. A heartfelt thank you to all the participating companies, distinguished guests, dedicated faculty, and enthusiastic students who made this day truly memorable. title: Namal Sports Gala 2025 | Namal University
text: Home Event Namal Sports Gala 2025 Event Latest From Namal Namal Sports Gala 2025 The Namal Sports Gala, organized by the Namal Sports and Adventure Club, was a resounding success! From the vibrant Opening Ceremony to the thrilling Final Matches, every moment was packed with excitement. The games delivered nail-biting finishes, and the passion, energy, and sportsmanship of the players won applause from all around. NSAC ensured nonstop entertainment for the spectators. It was sheer joy to witness the matches, and sportsmanship triumphed once again. Hats off to the management and all the players! title: Namal Summer School 2025 | Namal University
text: Home Event Namal Summer School 2025 Event Latest From Namal Namal Summer School 2025 A Grateful Farewell, A Hopeful Tomorrow The Closing Ceremony marked the end of an incredible journey filled with learning, laughter, and meaningful connections. Graced by the presence of worthy Rector Dr. M. Najam ul Islam, proud parents, dedicated instructors, and esteemed Namal faculty, the event celebrated not just the end of a program but the beginning of a lifelong pursuit of knowledge and growth. As we part ways, we carry with us the memories, the lessons, and the friendships that made this experience truly unforgettable. title: Namal University Hosts Summer School on Supercomputing & AI | Namal University
text: Home Event Namal University Hosts Summer School on Supercomputing & AI Event Latest From Namal Namal University Hosts Summer School on Supercomputing & AI Namal University successfully hosted a Summer School on Supercomputing and Artificial Intelligence for Tech Entrepreneurs, bringing together industry leaders and academic experts. Distinguished speakers included Muhammad Mustafa (DreamBig Semiconductor), Jahanzaib Nasar (CTO Forbmax IT Solutions, Product Lead for HPC IBM projects with Saudi Aramco, KAUST, KAPSARC, KFUPM), and Prof. Dr. Xavier Martorell (Barcelona Supercomputing Centre, Spain), along with Namal faculty. Professionals from leading IT companies and students participated, making it a rich platform for learning and collaboration. text: Home News Alumni Talk Series: Ghazanfar Idrees Empowers Namal Students to Thrive in the AI Era News What's happening at Namal? Alumni Talk Series: Ghazanfar Idrees Empowers Namal Students to Thrive in the AI Era As part of our Alumni Talk Series, Namal University proudly hosted Ghazanfar Idrees, Global Head at EDGE, for an insightful seminar on Thriving in the Age of AI. He inspired students to embrace innovation, harness AI, and navigate their careers toward success in a rapidly evolving world.
